meta.name: Freemoji
meta.description: Sends external emoji as hyperlinks instead of raw URLs. Customize the link text to your liking - use {{NAME}} for emoji name or {{.}} for a dot like Vencord.

linkText.description: Text to display in hyperlinks. Use {{NAME}} for emoji name, {{.}} for a dot (like Vencord), or any custom text.

useHyperlinks.description: Format emojis as hyperlinks [text](url) instead of plain URLs
